Name: test_coords_validation_and_success
Description: Validate tuple length, shape checks, and successful use of provided coords for ndarray input.

Name: test_auto_seeding_pixel_else_path_public_api
Description:
Public API call drives the pixel-seeding 'else' path.
We force the underlying plane fitter to treat axes as pixel-index grids,
then assert seeds: centers at pixel indices and widths == max(nx, ny)/10.

Name: test_pixel_fit_interpolates_world_centers_and_propagates_errors_ascending
Description:
- when DA has valid ascending 1-D world coords on (x,y) but we fit in pixel mode,
  the code interpolates centers into world coords and propagates uncertainties
  using local axis slope from np.gradient.

Name: test_numpy_input_coords_tuple_happy_path_returns_y1d_x1d
Description:
NumPy input with coords=(x1d, y1d) should be accepted and returned (y1d, x1d).
Covers the success path that converts and validates coords, then returns them.

Name: test_overwrite
Description: Test overwrite option using prebuilt int/sd zarr inputs

Name: test_version_fallback_unknown_when_no_dunder
Description: If both metadata lookup and __version__ access fail, version should be 'unknown'.

Name: test_auto_seed_pixel_public_api
Description: Public API: pixel coords + auto initial guesses.

Name: test_variance_explained_includes_self_documenting_note
Description:
Covers attach explanatory note to ``variance_explained`` DV.

We run a simple 2-D fit and assert that the returned Dataset contains the
``variance_explained`` variable and that it carries a long, self-documenting
``attrs['note']`` string describing the metric. Using ``coord_type='pixel'``
avoids any dependency on world coordinates.

Name: test_numpy_input_coords_tuple_wrong_lengths_raise
Description:
NumPy input with coords of wrong lengths should raise.
Exercises the validation right before the success return.

Name: test_initial_guesses_list_of_dicts_wrong_length_raises
Description: List[dict] initial_guesses length != n → ValueError (covers the raise).

Name: test_plot_components_fwhm_warns_and_draws_without_size_when_both_missing
Description: Cover metric=="fwhm" path that warns and uses zero radii when both size kinds are missing.

Name: test_plot_components_uses_model_branch_and_slices_leading_dims
Description: Cover the `elif "model"` block in plot_components (with slicing over leading dims).

Name: test_canonicalization_swaps_axes_and_rotates_theta_by_half_pi
Description:
Covers: th_math = -th, major/minor swap, +π/2 rotation, and wrap to (-π/2, π/2].
Construct an ellipse whose *math* major axis is along +y (σx < σy, θ_math = 0),
so canonicalization must rotate the reported math angle by +π/2.

Name: test_pixel_fit_interpolates_world_centers_descending_x
Description:
Also cover the _prep() path that reverses a descending axis before interpolation.
Keep assertions light (presence and bounds) to avoid over-constraining behavior.

Name: test_canonicalization_wraps_theta_into_half_pi_interval
Description:
Covers: half-π wrapping branch without swapping widths (σx >= σy).
Choose θ_math just over +π/2 so the wrapped angle lands in (-π/2, π/2].

Name: test_plot_components_fwhm_converts_from_sigma_when_fwhm_missing
Description: Cover metric=="fwhm" path that converts sigma→FWHM when fwhm vars are absent.

Name: test_inner_prep_lines_executed
Description:
Covers lines by exercising all branches of the local `_prep`.
We shim `_interp_centers_world` to reach the `_prep` closure and call it
with inputs that trigger: invalid, descending, non-strict, increasing.

Name: test_curve_fit_nonfinite_popt_triggers_not_success_nan_outputs
Description:
Force a non-finite solution from curve_fit so the not-success early-return path is exercised.

Covers the block that fills component arrays, model and residual with NaNs and sets success=False.

Name: test_version_fallback_reads_package_dunder
Description: If importlib.metadata.version fails, fallback should read astroviper.__version__.

Name: test_init_array_wrong_shape_hits_conv_arr_early_return_then_raises
Description: angle='pa' forces init → _convert_init_theta; (n,5) array triggers early return in _conv_arr.

Name: test_curve_fit_pcov_wrong_shape_sets_errors_nan_success_true
Description: pcov has the wrong shape → perr:=NaN, but success stays True.
